parameters.name: AppKey
parameters.description: The key of the application that is used to make an API call.

parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application. The name must be 4 to 26 characters in length. The name can contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_), and must start with a letter.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the application. The description can be up to 180 characters in length.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tag of objects that match the rule. You can specify multiple tags.
